English.Text: It is indeed an heroic charge. Led by the acting lieutenant, your sailors hurtle down the boarding bridges and storm the pirate ship, leaving a mangled trail in their wake. The black flag is ripped from the mast and the pirate's booty is plundered. Then your lieutenant impishly permits the survivors to go freeâ€” "Come now, be humble in thy victory! For how dull the world would be without those old pirate salts!"
